bach_open_taxonomy.ModelHub.to_metabase¶

ModelHub.to_metabase(df, model_type=None, config=None)[source]¶

Plot data in df to Metabase. If a card already exists, it will be updated. If df is a bach.Series, it will call bach.Series.to_frame().

Default options can be overridden using the config dictionary.

Parameters

  • df – bach.DataFrame() or bach.Series() to push to MetaBase.

  • model_type (Optional[str]) – Preset output to Metabase for a specific model. eg, ‘unique_users’

  • config (Optional[dict]) – Override default config options for the graph to be added/updated in Metabase.
